title: Betting and gaming : United Kingdom HMRC tax receipts 2000 to 2019
yAxis: Betting and gaming tax receipts in billion GBP
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Betting and gaming tax receipts in billion GBP, with a total of 19 data points. The chart has 5 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely positive which exists from 2018/19 to 2009/10.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is moderately positive which exists from 2005/06 to 2002/03.
Similarly, the next significant trend is moderately negative which exists from 2009/10 to 2007/08.
On the other hand, the next significant trend is moderately negative which exists from 2007/08 to 2005/06.
Differently, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2002/03 to 2000/01.
gold: This statistic shows the total United Kingdom ( UK ) HMRC betting and gaming tax receipts from fiscal year 2000/01 to fiscal year 2018/19 . Over the period there were a number of fluctuations but overall there was an increase . In the most recent recorded period , betting and gaming tax receipts totaled almost 3 billion British pounds , which was also the peak .
